Participar de reuniões diárias para acompanhamento de projeto

title: Profissional
description:
RESV: 43706
Sobre a BRQ Digital
Há 31 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.
Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.
BRQ WAY
No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia!
É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.
Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.
- O que procuramos?
Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!
- Quais as experiência você deve ter:
Requisitos:
Vaga: Desenvolvedor .NET - Pleno

Formato da Contratação - Híbrido
3x na semana Botafogo
-
Centro Empresarial Mourisco - R. Praia de Botafogo, 501 - 5o e 6o Andar - Botafogo, Rio de Janeiro - RJ, 22250-911
Requisitos:
Experiência com .Net Core, c#;
Restfull Apis Programação assíncrona Algum barramento de mensageria (RabbitMq, SQS, etc..) AC2, Lambda, Load Balance , SNS DynamoDb Docker, Design Patterns
Conhecimentos: Linguagem sql. Datadog
- O que temos pra te oferecer?
Mais do que um plano de carreira !
A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:
Carreira técnica:
Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!
Carreira de Liderança:
Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.
Experiência internacional:
Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.
Empreendedorismo:
De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.
- E os benefícios?
Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Atuação híbrida; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!
- Como é trabalhar na BRQ?
Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions
Curtiu? Então inscreva-se e venha para o melhor da Transformação Digital com a gente!

title: Tech Lead Test Automation SR
description:
Important Information
Location:
Brazil
Job Mode:
Full-time
Work Mode:
Work from home
Job Summary
As a Test Automation Tech Lead, you will make a significant contribution to product quality validation, test automation and continuous delivery by collaborating closely with cross-functional teams. The Test Automation Tech Lead evaluates required tools, promotes process improvements, and shapes standards and best practices while providing expert guidance to project teams across the organization. This role plays a fundamental role in driving the initiatives, plans and actions to guide the team.
Responsibilities and Duties
Guide the client and the testing team in building and improving the quality assurance process, also supporting the development team in the testing process, guidelines and best practices;
Seek to fully understand the product and business needs and discuss information needs with the product area;
Apply your knowledge and experience in planning and developing manual and automated tests (including unit tests, integration tests, GUI tests, acceptance tests, performance tests, etc.), and also in defining and deploying performance testing tools;
Develop and implement ways to facilitate the team's work, automating test and deployment routines;
Create a strong connection with people from different teams (quality, development and product) in order to facilitate communication and alignment;
Search for bugs in the software, aiming to improve test scenarios and test coverage to identify problems and improve product quality;
Plan and build test infrastructure aligned with CI/CD objectives using local or virtual (cloud) machines, ensuring that the system and information are secure, and that applicable people have appropriate access;
Seek continuous improvements in quality processes, enhancing and influencing the use of best practices in the software development life cycle.
Essential Skills
Proven experience Leading and Mentoring a team;
Proficiency with test automation frameworks and tools such as Playwright (with TS), Pytest, FastAPI;
Experience with CI/CD and pipelines;
Strong understanding of software development lifecycle and Agile methodologies;
Familiarity with PostgreeSQL, MySQL, Javascript, Typescript and Python;
Knowledge of creating scripts using automated testing tools;
Experience with Jira, Git, Notion, Confluence.
About Encora
Encora is the preferred digital engineering and modernization partner of some of the world’s leading enterprises and digital native companies. With over 9,000 experts in 47+ offices and innovation labs worldwide, Encora’s technology practices include Product Engineering & Development, Cloud Services, Quality Engineering, DevSecOps, Data & Analytics, Digital Experience, Cybersecurity, and AI & LLM Engineering.
At Encora, we hire professionals based solely on their skills and qualifications, and do not discriminate based on age, disability, religion, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, or nationality.

title: Financial Researcher (Research Associate)
description:
About YipitData:
YipitData is the market-leading data and analytics firm. We analyze billions of data points every day to provide accurate, detailed insights across industries, including consumer brands, technology, software, and healthcare.
Our insights team uses proprietary technology to identify, license, clean, and analyze the data that many of the world’s largest investment funds and corporations depend on. We raised $475M from The Carlyle Group at a valuation over $1B, further accelerating our growth and market impact.
We have been recognized multiple times as one of Inc’s Best Workplaces. As a fast-growing company backed by The Carlyle Group and Norwest Venture Partners, YipitData is driven by a people-first culture rooted in mastery, ownership, and transparency.
With offices in New York, Austin, Miami, Denver, Mountain View, Seattle, Hong Kong, Shanghai, Beijing, Guangzhou, and Singapore, we continue to expand our reach and impact across global markets.
About The Role:
We currently have 20+ Research team members in our Investor Research business who create and maintain our data products, and we are expanding our team by adding a Research Associate role to drive the development of
fundamental research
for our
high-demand subscription-based data products . This is an exciting opportunity for someone with
3 years of experience
who is eager to play a key role in shaping the
data-driven future of investment research
by supporting senior research team members in key tasks including: answering client emails, analyzing data trends across multiple tickers, and delivering custom slices of data via SQL/Python. Those with excellent data analytical and written communication skills are encouraged to apply.
We expect East Coast work hours.
As Our Research Associate You Will:
Support high-impact work
by helping the Research Analyst analyze financial models, identify segment-level trends, and convey client-facing takeaways.
You will work with massive amounts of data to help answer our clients’ key questions
about the companies we cover and the datasets we analyze. You will learn about our proprietary methods and techniques for ensuring data accuracy and deriving key insights.
Become a trusted resource for our internal stakeholders and sector teams,
working with them to identify and answer their key questions. By contributing to data deliverables, custom analysis, or data reports consumed by the top investors in the world.
Improve our products and increase our coverage
by supporting the Research Analyst in maintaining product integrity and completing deliverables to clients, including developing new features and product improvements. We value self-improvement and experimentation and expect you to enhance the products, pipelines, or processes that you own.
Sharpen SQL and Python skills , our new hire training program will enrich and expand SQL fundamentals.
You Are Likely To Succeed If:
You have 3+ years of experience in financial banking or investment research and have a strong understanding of business fundamentals
You have experience as a research or data analyst, ideally with some exposure to SQL
You have strong attention to detail and are a methodical problem-solver
You have excellent oral and written communication skills, with the ability to interact effectively with internal teams across time zones and cultures
You strive to make tasks as efficient as possible
You are enthusiastic about making a big impact at a rapidly growing company
What We Offer:
Our compensation package includes competitive salary and comprehensive benefit offerings.
We care about your career. We provide opportunities to grow your career by taking on new challenges, developing new skill sets, and driving more impact. You will have regular career conversations with your manager where you will discuss your short and long-term career goals and how you are progressing.
Your growth at YipitData is determined by the impact that you make, not by tenure, unnecessary Facetime, or office politics. Everyone at YipitData is empowered to learn, self-improve, and master their skills in an environment focused on ownership, respect, and trust.
Flexible PTO for any reason, including sick days (no specified limits)
Flexible work schedule
Personal laptop
Health and wellness package
Remote work
At YipitData, we value ownership and impact. Starting compensation is based on level and years of relevant experience. We have a thoughtfully created career ladder and annual review process that are designed to reward strong performance with opportunities for compensation increases and advancement.
See this short video
to learn more about our organization, product, and why some of our current Data team members love working here!
Candidates must have primary residency (and be physically located) in the country of hire (AKA Colombia/Brazil) in order to be considered for the position. If hired, the worker must maintain primary residency in the country of hire in order to be eligible for employment.
We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender, gender identity or expression, or veteran status. We are proud to be an equal-opportunity employer.

title: Major Incident Manager - Inglês avançado - Remoto
description:
Major Incident Management, HCL Tech
(Presencial) / Major Incident Management / Integral
Somos a HCLTech, uma das maiores empresas de tecnologia e DSA que mais crescem no mundo, com mais de 224.000 profissionais espalhados em 60 países, impulsionando o progresso através de recursos líderes do segmento e centrados nas áreas de Digital, Engenharia e Nuvem.
A força motriz por trás desse trabalho, nosso pessoal, é um público diversificado, criativo e apaixonado, o que nos possibilita estar sempre elevando o padrão de excelência de nossos serviços. De nosso lado, trabalhamos para que cada um de nossos profissionais possa atingir seu melhor, ao mesmo tempo em que nos esforçamos para ajudá-los a encontrar sua inspiração diária e, assim, se tornar a melhor versão de si mesmos.
Estamos à procura de um
Major Incident Management
altamente talentoso e automotivado para se juntar a nós em nossa jornada para avançar no mundo tecnológico por meio da inovação e criatividade.
Principais responsabilidades:
Abrir e iniciar a ponte para discutir o problema dentro de 5 minutos e, dentro de 15 minutos, publicar a comunicação
Compreender o problema do ponto de vista do negócio e envolver as equipes necessárias/pertinentes
Seguir a lista de verificação MIM e publicar a comunicação com a devida validação
Avaliar a situação e priorizar o problema com base no impacto nos negócios
Verificar se todas as informações necessárias estão atualizadas na ferramenta de tickets e todos os documentos de suporte no SharePoint do MIM
Comunicar a atualização de status/situação aos stakeholders
Garantir que os SLAs sejam cumpridos pelas equipes de resolução
Garantir que as mudanças estejam sendo verificadas durante os incidentes HIGH e MI
Garantir que os tickets de RCA/Problema sejam fornecidos pela equipe de resolução
Garantir que não haja falhas no processo usando a lista de verificação MIM
Capturar observações durante a situação P1 com atualizações de cronograma adequadas sobre a situação
Manter que não haja escalonamento durante o problema P1
Garantir que os participantes necessários sejam chamados e envolvidos durante a situação Major e High Major
Garantir que a resolução adequada seja fornecida antes de encerrar a chamada de ponte e manter que as informações corretas tenham sido capturadas
Garantir que o Dashboard seja usado durante incidentes High Major e Major
Manter a transferência de turno adequada para outro gerente de incidentes
Manter a propriedade de ponta a ponta dos incidentes Major
Qualificações e experiências:
Experiência em Gestão de Incidentes com conhecimento e compreensão sólida de várias tecnologias/domínios de TI
Habilidades de gestão de relacionamento influente com stakeholders, gestão sênior, colegas e provedores de serviços externos
Habilidades de resolução de problemas em um ambiente de suporte, incluindo um forte senso de compromisso e determinação para resolver incidentes
Habilidades de identificar problemas que causam incidentes e prolongam o tempo de reparo, e atacar os problemas para eliminar a causa em nosso ambiente
Compreensão de questões técnicas fundamentais de TI e relacionamentos
Sensibilidade e urgência ao lidar com interrupções na linha de negócios
Capacidade de influenciar e liderar conversas técnicas com vários grupos de suporte de infraestrutura
Excelentes habilidades de comunicação verbal e escrita, com a capacidade de interagir e influenciar em todos os níveis da organização
Habilidades de supervisão e capacidade de alavancar suporte de outras partes da organização
Experiência em gerenciar múltiplos stakeholders em todos os níveis da organização, especialmente no nível de gestão sênior
Compreensão de Tecnologias e Ferramentas ITSM
Certificação ITIL e SIAM (não obrigatória), informações básicas sobre infraestrutura, serviços em nuvem e serviços de aplicativos
Inglês avançado
Por que nos escolher?
Somos uma das maiores empresas de tecnologia que mais crescem no mundo, com escritórios em mais de 60 países e 224.000 colaboradores
Nossa empresa é extremamente diversificada com 165 nacionalidades representadas
Oferecemos a oportunidade de trabalhar com colegas espalhados ao redor do mundo
Oferecemos um ambiente de trabalho virtual em primeiro lugar, promovendo uma boa integração entre seu trabalho e vida pessoal, em uma flexibilidade real
Estamos comprometidos com seu crescimento, oferecendo oportunidades de aprendizado e desenvolvimento de carreira em todos os níveis para ajudá-lo a encontrar seu brilho único.
Oferecemos benefícios abrangentes para todos os funcionários
Somos certificados como "Great Place to Work" e "Top Employer" em 17 países, e reconhecidos como “Top Employer” no Brasil especificamente, oferecendo um ambiente de trabalho positivo que valoriza o reconhecimento e o respeito dos funcionários
Igualdade & Oportunidade para Todos
Representando 165 nacionalidades em todo o mundo, nos orgulhamos de ser um empregador que oferece igualdade de oportunidades, comprometido em fornecer oportunidades iguais de emprego a todos os candidatos e funcionários, independentemente de raça, religião, sexo, cor, idade, nacionalidade, gravidez, orientação sexual, deficiência física ou informações genéticas, ou qualquer outra classificação protegida, de acordo com as leis federais, estaduais e/ou locais.

title: Risk Control Specialist
description:
Responsibilities
Assess and handle risk control alerts according to the SOP, ensuring the accuracy and timeliness of alert handling during work hours to avoid false positives and missed alerts.
Review user information and withdrawal requests.
Monitor changes in risk control rules of external competitors and provide corresponding suggestions based on existing rules.
Continuously learn platform rules and enhance personal professional skills.
Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Finance or a related field
Possess business sensitivity and awareness of risk
Strong psychological quality with effective communication and judgment skills
Strong logical thinking and data collection and analysis abilities
Strict adherence to professional ethics and information security and confidentiality in daily work
Available to work on weekends and with rotated shifts between day and overnight shifts
Proficiency in English. (Proficiency in Chinese is a plus)

title: Analista de Desenvolvimento Pleno
description:
A Química Anastacio é uma das maiores distribuidoras de produtos químicos da América Latina e oferece um amplo portfólio de produtos e ingredientes, além de soluções e serviços inteligentes, auxiliando os clientes e fornecedores no crescimento dos seus negócios. Contamos com uma excelente estrutura comercial, logística e técnica, e atendemos todas as indústrias do mercado.
Nos últimos anos, fortalecemos nossas operações transformando em ágil, simples e focada no cliente. Hoje temos 6 centros de distribuições localizados estrategicamente no Brasil, presença na Argentina e México, com meta de expandir nossa participação no mercado da América Latina e representamos cerca de 400 fornecedores globais.
Para mais informações, visite E ATRIBUIÇÕES
Esta posição será responsável pelos desenvolvimentos de Novos Produtos e Fornecedores, tendo interface diária com as áreas de Vendas, Logística Internacional, Comércio Exterior, Financeiro e Qualidade;
Fazer prospecção e homologação de produtos e fornecedores;
Realizar simulação de custo de nacionalização;
Solicitação de amostras aos fornecedores e acompanhamento de chegada e liberação de amostras junto à Anvisa;
Solicitação de cadastro de produto e fornecedor, resposta a SD’s e outros processos operacionais de desenvolvimento;
Emissão de pedido de compra e tratativa de não conformidades e debit notes.
REQUISITOS E QUALIFICAÇÕES
Superior completo em Química, Engenharia Química, Comércio Exterior, Relações Internacionais, Farmácia e/ou outros correlatos;
Inglês avançado ( haverá teste de conversação );
Pacote Office intermediário ou avançado (foco Outlook e Excel);
Desejável conhecimento no desenvolvimento de novos produtos e fornecedores nacionais e internacionais, compras nacionais e internacionais, com preferência para o mercado de matérias-primas químicas (segmento: Cosméticos).
Local de trabalho : Pinheiros, São Paulo - SP
Modelo híbrido : 3 dias presenciais
Horário de trabalho : segunda à sexta-feira das 8h00 às 17h45
Todas nossas posições são inclusivas para grupos minoritários e pessoa com deficiência.

title: Business Intelligence Engineer (BI/data analytics/REMOTE)
description:
ITTConnect is seeking a
BI Analyst
to work remotely for a client in the US. This is a potentially long term position with a client that is a global leader in consulting, digital transformation, technology and engineering services with over 300,000 team members in nearly 50 countries. The end client is in the retail space.

We are looking for a
proactive and detail-oriented Sourcing Analyst
to join our recruitment team in the HR and talent acquisition sector. In this role, you will be responsible for identifying, attracting, and engaging potential candidates through various sourcing strategies. You will also support internal recruitment operations by assisting with sourcing, CV formatting, interview scheduling, and documentation.

English Intermediate

Talent where you need it, when you need it!
SGF Global is a leading specialized talent solutions provider dedicated to connecting highly qualified professionals with opportunities across multiple sectors. We offer contract, temporary, and permanent hiring solutions for roles in technology, finance and accounting, engineering, marketing and creative, legal services, administrative and customer support, energy, oil and gas, telecommunications, manufacturing, aerospace, life sciences, mining, and utilities.
At SGF Global, we work to put you in the best position to succeed. We provide access to top-tier positions, competitive compensation, attractive benefits, and free online training. Stay on top of every opportunity, anytime—even on the go.

title: Power BI Engineer
description:
We are a high-growth, disruptive company combining gold and technology. Our vision is to help the world rediscover honest money. The successful candidate brings significant skills to help propel us forward on our mission.
We are seeking an experienced
Power BI Engineer
with a strong SQL background to design, build, and maintain robust reporting solutions. The ideal candidate will have a proven ability to develop semantic data models, craft efficient SQL queries, ensure data quality through Power Query transformations, design intuitive dashboards using advanced Power BI visualizations and DAX measures, and establish proper security protocols. This role will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, translating business requirements into impactful data-driven insights.
Key Responsibilities:
Data Modeling & Querying
Develop and maintain data models (star/snowflake schema) in Power BI, leveraging advanced SQL queries.
Create semantic models that accurately represent business logic and support optimal report performance.
ETL & Data Transformations
Utilize Power Query for data shaping, cleaning, and transformation, ensuring data integrity and consistency.
Collaborate with data engineering teams to integrate various data sources (e.g., relational databases, APIs, CSV files).
Report & Dashboard Development
Design and build interactive, user-friendly Power BI dashboards and reports that convey insights effectively.
Develop, optimize, and maintain DAX calculations, measures, and KPIs.
Security & Governance
Implement Row-Level Security (RLS) or other relevant Power BI security features to protect sensitive data.
Work with management teams to ensure adherence to data governance and regulatory requirements.
Performance Tuning & Troubleshooting
Optimize Power BI data models, queries, and measures for performance and scalability.
Diagnose and resolve report rendering and data refresh performance issues.
Collaboration & Stakeholder Engagement
Partner with business stakeholders to gather requirements and deliver actionable reports and insights.
Provide training, documentation, and support to end-users and other internal teams.
Continuous Improvement
Stay current with emerging Power BI capabilities, DAX best practices, SQL performance enhancements, and analytics trends.
Contribute to the development of best practices for analytics, data governance, and solution design.
Qualifications:
Experience:
3+ years
of professional experience with Power BI development, including data modeling, Power Query, and DAX.
Strong SQL proficiency , including complex joins, stored procedures, and performance tuning.
Technical Skills:
Power BI : Data modeling, DAX, Power Query M.
SQL : SQL, query optimization, data warehousing concepts.
ETL Tools & Processes : Understanding of data pipelines, transformations, and integration.
Version Control
(e.g., Git) and CI/CD pipelines for BI solutions (a plus).
Familiarity with
Row-Level Security
and other Power BI security features.
Experience with
Azure Data Services
(e.g., Azure Synapse, Azure Analysis Services) is a plus.
Soft Skills:
Strong communication skills to collaborate with stakeholders and translate technical findings into actionable insights.
Adaptable team player who can work in an agile environment.
Proven problem-solving skills and high attention to detail.
Language:
C1 English Proficiency Required.
Compensation:
Competitive Salary
Company Provided Computer
Stock Options
Flexible PTO

To apply, please send a cover letter and resume to

title: DevOps - SRE (Site Reliability Engineering)
description:
Description
Important Information
Location:
Brazil
Job Mode:
Full-time
Work Mode:
Work from home
Job Summary
Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) is a discipline that incorporates aspects of software engineering and applies them to infrastructure and operations problems. The main goals are to create scalable and highly reliable software systems.
Responsibilities and Duties
Utilize software tools and automated tasks for continuous monitoring and reliability of applications;
Act swiftly in response to emergency situations impacting system reliability in production environments, performing root cause analysis for on-going incidents;
Oversee and streamline change management processes to enhance system performance and reliability. Ownership of releases to production environments;
Work closely with development teams throughout the software lifecycle, with a focus on contributing to solving system-related issues and eliminating toil - automating routine tasks for enhanced productivity;
Focus on the reliability and scalability of systems, ensuring high performance and efficiency standards.
Essential Skills
Proficiency in monitoring tools like Azure Monitoring, App Insights, Prometheus, Grafana. Project tracking and version management with tools like JIRA, SVN, GitHub;
Expertise with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, ARM/Bicep, Pulumi, etc.) and release management tooling (ArgoCD, Harness, Octopus, etc.);
Experience in incident alert tools (PageDuty, Opsgenie), and container orchestration tools like Kubernetes, AKS and similar.
About Encora
Encora is the preferred digital engineering and modernization partner of some of the world’s leading enterprises and digital native companies. With over 9,000 experts in 47+ offices and innovation labs worldwide, Encora’s technology practices include Product Engineering & Development, Cloud Services, Quality Engineering, DevSecOps, Data & Analytics, Digital Experience, Cybersecurity, and AI & LLM Engineering.
At Encora, we hire professionals based solely on their skills and qualifications, and do not discriminate based on age, disability, religion, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, or nationality.

title: RPG/EDI Programmer & Systems Analyst
description:
RPG/EDI Programmer & Systems Analyst
Are you a creative thinker who enjoys solving complex technical problems with minimal guidance? Do you take pride in delivering high-impact solutions and contributing to long-term success? If so, we’d love to hear from you!
We’re seeking a proactive and experienced
RPG/EDI Programmer & Systems Analyst
to join our innovative team. The ideal candidate brings
at least 2 years of EDI programming experience
and
4+ years of hands-on RPG development , including expertise in IBM i (AS400) systems.
In this role, you will support and evolve our production and development environments while continuously seeking ways to innovate, optimize, and drive technical excellence.
Why Join Us?
Meaningful Work:
Be a key player in transformative projects that modernize and streamline business systems.
Autonomy & Growth:
Work independently, develop your skills, and contribute to a collaborative, solution-focused team.
Fast-Paced Environment:
Take on technical challenges in an agile, results-driven culture.
Innovation-Driven:
Your ideas are valued—help shape process improvements and deliver smarter solutions.
Key Responsibilities (Including but not limited to)
RPG Development
Maintain and enhance IBM ILE RPG applications (Free & Fixed format)
Develop and integrate service programs, modules, and binding directories for APIs (SOAP and JSON) —
experience required
Contribute to all stages of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
Configure and manage test and production environments, monitor job performance, and resolve recurring issues in AS400 systems
EDI Support
Analyze and implement EDI X12 transactions in alignment with partner and business needs
Customize and validate EDI configurations before production rollout
Modify EDI data structures, manage partner-specific formats, and oversee EDI operations within RPG/AS400 applications
Core Skills & Attributes
Ability to work independently and manage changing priorities
Strong problem-solving and analytical thinking with minimal input
Innovation-oriented mindset with a continuous improvement approach
Experience working in logistics or LTL (Less-than-Truckload) industries is a plus
Technical Requirements

(Mandatory)
Solid experience with SOAP APIs (srvpgm, modules, binding directories)
(Mandatory)
Strong command of DB2 and CL/CLLE
Familiarity with AS400 operations and job management
FTP/SFTP and EDI systems experience
(Preferred)
Ideal Candidate
Analytical & Detail-Oriented
– Skilled at identifying root causes and reverse-engineering solutions
Self-Motivated
– Takes initiative and pursues technical growth independently
Adaptable
– Thrives in evolving environments and shifting priorities
Curious & Passionate
– Eager to learn and contribute meaningfully to team success
Preferred Qualifications
Advanced English (written required; verbal skills are a plus)
Recruitment Process
If we review your resume and believe you may be a good fit, you’ll be invited to complete two skills assessments:
AS400 RPG Test
– Assesses your knowledge of RPG programming in an IBM i environment
AS400 EDI Test
– Evaluates your analytical skills and EDI configuration abilities within AS400 systems

title: Account Manager PL (Español)
description:
Por que trabalhar na Rentcars?
Somos a maior plataforma de locação de veículos da América Latina e um dos maiores players mundiais do setor. Desde 2009, conectamos nossos clientes às melhores opções de carros para alugar.
Hoje, estamos presentes em mais de 160 países! Somos parceiros das melhores e maiores locadoras, em mais de 5 mil cidades e 20 mil pontos de retirada em todo o mundo.
Nessa posição você ficará responsável por:
Gestão de Parcerias
Gerir performance de vendas e acordos com todas as locadoras, identificando oportunidades de aumento de receita;
Prospectar novos sócios e negociar expansão da Rentcars em LATAM e no exterior;
Supervisionar produtos, serviços, políticas de preço e canais de vendas de cada parceiro;
Fortalecer o relacionamento com as locadoras.
Performance & Análise de Mercado
Monitorar indicadores-chave;
Analisar constantemente o mercado de aluguel de carros em toda a América Latina e internacionais, detectando tendências e gaps;
Compartilhar relatórios de desempenho com parceiros e liderança para embasar decisões conjuntas.
Estratégia & Crescimento
Desenvolver e executar ações com Marketing e Produto para incrementar receita;
Mapear oportunidades de negócio em mercados maduros e emergentes, alinhando-as ao roadmap da empresa;
Operações & Integração
Coordenar o processo de onboarding de novas locadoras, garantindo qualidade dos dados e fluxo de trabalho;
Abrir tickets e gerar tarefas para registrar expansões, oportunidades, novas locadoras ou ajustes operacionais;
Apoiar áreas internas (Finanças, Operações, Customer Service e Growth) na solução de problemas e alinhamento de processos;
Comunicação & Relacionamento Contínuo
Oferecer suporte ágil e proativo a parceiros via e-mail, WhatsApp e reuniões presenciais ou virtuais;
Preparar apresentações internas e externas com os principais indicadores de mercado e evolução de parcerias.
Competências & Perfil
Mentalidade data-driven e domínio de ferramentas de BI como Tableau e base de dados;
Agilidade para adaptar-se a mudanças de cenário;
Experiência em negociações internacionais e gestão cross-functional;
Capacidade de definir prioridades e executar múltiplas tarefas em ambiente de ritmo acelerado;
Proatividade, iniciativa, senso de urgência e perfil analítico.
O que esperamos de você (experiências, soft e hard skills):
Formação acadêmica: Ensino superior completo (Administração, Marketing, Economia ou áreas afins);
Espanhol nativo ou avançado;
Experiência comprovada: Mínimo de 3 anos em gestão de carteira B2B, preferencialmente no setor de serviços ou turismo;
Habilidades de comunicação: Excelência em relacionamento interpessoal, negociação e apresentação de resultados;
Mentalidade data-driven: Capacidade de analisar KPIs e usar ferramentas de BI e planilhas avançadas (Sheets, Excel);
Organização e proatividade: Definição de prioridades, multitasking em ritmo acelerado e senso de urgência;
Ferramentas digitais: Domínio de Google Workspace (Sheets, Apresentações, Docs) e plataformas de CRM;
Perfil analítico e emocional: Inteligência emocional para gestão de conflitos e orientação a resultados mensuráveis;
Postura profissional: Boa apresentação, ética e comprometimento com metas e prazos;
Proatividade: antecipa necessidades dos clientes e da equipe, age sem esperar instruções;
Orientação ao cliente: empatia e foco em entender e superar expectativas;
Adaptabilidade: flexível frente a mudanças de prioridade e de mercado;
Comunicação assertiva: transmite informações com clareza e escuta ativa;
Colaboração cross-functional: compartilha conhecimento e trabalha bem com outras áreas;
Pensamento estratégico: enxerga oportunidades de longo prazo e alinha ações ao objetivo de negócio;
Resiliência: mantém a motivação e o desempenho mesmo sob pressão;
Inteligência emocional: gerencia conflitos e relacionamentos com equilíbrio e empatia.
O que pode ser um diferencial:
Inglês avançado;
Experiência em serviços e relacionamento B2B;
Domínio de técnicas de negociação, como venda persuasiva.
A gente sabe que cada pessoa precisa de liberdade para fazer suas escolhas, por isso nosso programa de benefícios é flexível! Chamamos ele, carinhosamente, de Beneflex, e funciona assim: você tem alguns benefícios base, sem custo, e pontos para distribuir entre as opções que melhor te atendem!
Benefícios base:
(sem custo) Plano de saúde Unimed sem mensalidades para titular e dependentes, somente coparticipação (regional);
(sem custo) Seguro de vida;
(sem custo) Vale-refeição ou vale-alimentação (R$34,87 por dia trabalhado), sem descontos, com possibilidade de complementação;
Amplie suas possibilidades com:
Meu Pet Club, plano de saúde pet;
Plano odontológico (Metlife), podendo incluir dependentes;
Wellhub (Gympass) para se exercitar e movimentar o corpo;
VIK, app gamificado para estimular a prática de atividade física;
InvestPass para auxiliar na organização financeira;
Vale cultura, para turbinar seus momentos de lazer!
Outros benefícios, válidos para todos os Renties:
RentieScholarship, auxílio financeiro para estudos (graduação, pós-graduação, idiomas ou certificações);
Learning Rocks, plataforma com foco no desenvolvimento de soft skills;
Udemy, plataforma de ensino para hard skills;
Bônus anual atrelado a metas, management by objectives (MBO);
Day Off de aniversário;
Sem dress-code;
Kit maternidade para gestantes, licença-maternidade estendida (6 meses) e auxílio de R$ 800 no mês de nascimento do bebê;
Keiken, aplicativo de saúde e bem-estar, com assistência psicológica;
RentieHunter, programa interno de indicações.
Para quem está na sede, presencialmente:
Frutas frescas todos os dias;
Máquina de café e chá à disposição;
Espaços de descompressão (ping-pong, videogame, etc.);
Happy hours e outras celebrações.
Gostou?! Inscreva-se agora em nosso banco de talentos e acompanhe as novidades pelo e-mail - nossa principal ferramenta de comunicação. Atente-se às mensagens, você receberá atualizações periódicas.
RENTCARS WITHOUT BARRIERS
Valorizamos a diversidade e oferecemos oportunidades iguais para todas as pessoas que se candidatam às nossas vagas, independente de raça, gênero, orientação sexual, aparência, nacionalidade, religião, idade, deficiências físicas e mentais, estado civil ou ideologia política.

title: Node.js Developer
description:
About Us
Founded in 2019 by two best friends, Jon and Eli,
XILO
set out to revolutionize the insurance industry by solving its biggest challenges. Eli, a brokerage owner, brought invaluable industry expertise, while Jon, an experienced software engineer, saw an opportunity to innovate using technology. Initially launched as a vertical SaaS solution addressing core quoting challenges, XILO has since evolved into a trailblazing Vertical AI company leveraging the latest AI technology to transform the industry. By layering cutting-edge AI solutions onto its SaaS platform, XILO is driving innovation far beyond its original vision. Having recently closed our Series A funding round, XILO is growing rapidly and seeking talented individuals who want to do career-defining work in a mission-driven startup that’s at the forefront of AI innovation.
About The Role
As a
Senior Backend Engineer , you’ll be a key player in designing, building, and scaling our TypeScript-based microservices. This role offers flexibility to specialize in
OCR ,
RPA ,
CRM ,
Workflows
or
Forms
depending on your interests and expertise. You’ll collaborate across teams, solve complex technical challenges, and directly contribute to the transformation of an entire industry.
What You’ll Do:
Architect and develop scalable TypeScript microservices powering XILO’s platform.
Implement advanced features in one or more focus areas:
○
OCR : Enhance document digitization and data extraction pipelines.
○
RPA : Build bots to automate repetitive tasks and drive efficiency.
○
CRM : Architect and develop microservices for our CRM system.
○
Workflow : Automate actions and integrations with different systems.
○
Forms : Build and maintain the backend part of dynamic forms solution.
Optimize system performance, reliability, and scalability.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams (product, frontend, data science) to deliver seamless integrations.
Mentor and guide junior engineers, fostering a collaborative and growth-oriented team culture.
Implement best practices for API security, data privacy, and maintainability.
What we’re looking for
7+ years of backend engineering experience, with expertise in TypeScript/Node.js.
Understanding of microservices architecture and cloud-based deployment (AWS, Heroku) is a big plus
Deep understanding of Postgres database architecture and design.
Proven experience with scalable API design and database optimization.
Hands-on experience with Nest.Js
Expertise in one or more areas: OCR (e.g., Azure Form Recognizer, AWS Textract, etc.), RPA tools, CRM (Salesforce, MS Dynamics365, Zoho), or Workflow automation (Zapier, Make(Integromat), IFTTT)
Passion for writing clean, maintainable, and testable code.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced startup environment.
A collaborative mindset with a willingness to mentor and learn from others.
What we offer
Collaborative and innovative work environment
Flex PTO for any reason, including sick days (no specified limits), flexible work schedule.
Personal laptop.
Health and wellness package.

title: Asistente Virtual - Portuguese speaker
description:
Assistente Virtual
Estamos à procura de uma pessoa que esteja disponível para fazer o horário da manhã (hora portuguesa)
Na
FLiPO
, revolucionamos a indústria ótica ao oferecer óculos totalmente personalizáveis. Nós fornecemos as lentes e a visão, enquanto os clientes adicionam cor e estilo. O nosso objetivo é criar um produto de altíssima qualidade, versatilidade e inovação.
Estabelecemos contacto com os nossos clientes através das redes sociais e do nosso site, indicando-lhes as óticas mais próximas para que possam viver a experiência
FLiPO
pessoalmente.
Quais serão as suas contribuições?
Como
Assistente Virtual , terá um papel crucial no acompanhamento do cliente
FLiPO
ao longo do processo de venda, ajudando a captar o maior número possível de clientes potenciais e oferecendo o melhor atendimento. A sua atuação será fundamental para aconselhar os clientes de maneira eficaz, chamando a sua atenção e garantindo o agendamento de uma consulta connosco, com a possibilidade de que essa reunião se transforme numa venda vantajosa para a empresa.
O seu impacto na
FLiPO
será muito importante, assumindo os seguintes papéis e contribuições:
Agendar consultas através do CRM, chamadas ou online.
Manter os clientes informados sobre as suas consultas e oferecer as melhores opções para incentivar sua presença.
Propor melhorias com base no feedback dos clientes, ajudando a otimizar e maximizar o desempenho dos templates e chatbots.
O que oferecemos na FLiPO?
Impacto : Queremos mudar o mundo e deixar uma marca, causando um impacto duradouro no mundo dos negócios e na sociedade com uma visão aprimorada. Por que não almejar desafios ainda maiores?
Escalabilidade : Temos um projeto com um grande potencial financeiro e de equipa, o que nos permitirá crescer continuamente e alcançar novos patamares.
‍‍‍
Equipe : Somos uma equipa jovem e orientada a objetivos, com aspirações compartilhadas e um forte desejo de explorar novas experiências. Valorizamos a colaboração e procuramos pessoas comprometidas com os nossos objetivos comuns. O que acha?
‍
Flexibilidade e Crescimento : A
FLiPO
é um projeto flexível, permitindo que escolha os seus rumos e seja guiado em direção aos objetivos que deseja alcançar.
Visão 360° : Trabalhamos juntos para impulsionar estratégias globais e analisamos o negócio de todos os ângulos.
O seu perfil encaixa-se perfeitamente se...
Gosta de interagir com clientes e guiá-los ao longo de todo o processo.
Tem compromisso com o projeto e assume responsabilidade pelo processo.
Possui habilidades para trabalhar de forma multidisciplinar.
Não tem medo de propor novas ideias e gosta de ser ouvido.
Tem experiência em startups ou empresas em fase inicial.
Gosta e sente-se motivado a trabalhar remotamente.
O que implica ter sucesso connosco?
Formação em Administração de Empresas, Marketing ou áreas relacionadas.
Conhecimento do Pacote Office, Google Drive e outras ferramentas de gestão.
Experiência com softwares de gestão ou sistemas CRM.
Fluência em
Português e Espanhol .
Excelentes habilidades de comunicação verbal e escrita.
Pelo menos
1 ano de experiência
em vendas ou atendimento ao cliente.
Capacidade de enfrentar desafios e resolver problemas de forma eficaz.
Ligação à internet estável
para garantir comunicação fluida com clientes e equipa.
Ambiente de trabalho tranquilo , ideal para realizar chamadas e atender os clientes de forma profissional.
Identificou-se com a vaga? Envie o seu currículo e junte-se a nossa equipa jovem e ambiciosa, pronta para crescer e deixar a sua marca no mundo da visão personalizada!

A Softtek valoriza a diversidade e inclusão em sua força de trabalho. Independentemente da sua, etnia, idade, gênero, orientação sexual, deficiência, credo ou convicção política, o que importa são as suas competências e habilidades para fazer acontecer
Os Softtekians são seres humanos talentosos e auto-determinados que se consideram pessoas loucamente incríveis! Venha fazer parte desse time!!!
Quer saber mais? Acesse: a Softtek : Fundada em 1982, a Softtek é uma fornecedora global de soluções de TI orientadas a processos com 30 escritórios na América do Norte, América Latina, Europa e Ásia. Com 15 centros de entrega global nos EUA, México, China, Brasil, Argentina, Costa Rica, Espanha, Hungria e Índia, a Softtek ajuda a melhorar e produzir resultados previsíveis para corporações de primeira linha em mais de 20 países. A Softtek é a criadora e líder da indústria nearshore.

Caso se candidate para essa vaga seus dados ficarão armazenados em nosso banco de dados, atendendo a privacidade de dados conforme à Lei Geral de Proteção de Dados, lei no 13.
709/2018.Caso não tenha interesse em manter suas informações pessoais em nosso banco de dados, solicitamos nos encaminhar um e-mail para úvidas também podem ser enviadas ao e-mail e ttek.com.

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer (LatAm)
description:
The Opportunity
We are seeking a ML Engineer to apply advanced machine learning models that predict and model creditworthiness, transaction labeling, identity mapping, underwriting, cash flow, lease renewals, and other key financial factors. This role will work closely with the Data Analytics and Data Engineering teams to ensure the models are trained on high-quality data and integrated into production systems. This role requires a high degree of collaboration with key managers, product owners, and other peers and cross-functional partners that rely, produce, and interact with the data domain across the organization (e.g., Data Engineers, Data Analysts, Backend Engineers, Marketing, Sales). The ML Engineer will focus on creating interpretable, accurate, and scalable predictive models utilizing datasets generated from our AWS and Snowflake environments. Additionally, you will translate model insights into actionable strategies that drive business decisions and financial inclusion.
In addition to the technical responsibilities, you will coach and mentor your fellow data analysts and data engineers. You will ensure efficient delivery through effective planning, engaging with others, prioritizing, and developing, testing, and releasing your work. You will exhibit and foster the company culture and operating principles.
Core Competencies
Superb programming, software, and data development skills
– You can independently devise and implement solutions to problems with minimal explanation needed.
Strong communication skills
– You can efficiently translate between technical and non-technical audiences and have strong writing skills.
High standards
– Your work is of the highest quality, and you continue to raise the bar within your immediate team and our organization.
Balance velocity with long-term goals
– You balance thinking big with delivering the right thing in an agile and speedy manner. You are curious, flexible, and nimble in your approach and implementation.
Heart of a teacher
– You are a capable mentor and able to inspire and empower others on your team.
Getting work done and driving excellence
– You strive for excellence and prioritize delivering high-quality outcomes and projects.
Adaptability
– You thrive in an environment that changes quickly and is constantly presenting new challenges.
Basic Qualifications
Knowledge & Background : Master’s degree in mathematics, statistics, economics, computer science, or other quantitative disciplines with a focus on data analysis. We will also consider candidates with a relevant bachelor’s degree in a STEM field with 10+ years of relevant work experience in Machine Learning and Statistics.
AI & ML Experience : Very strong experience in AI and ML in the financial technology or service industry, including working with credit and financial datasets.
AI & ML Engineering :
Proven track record in building and deploying machine learning models, with a strong understanding of the theory and tradeoffs behind these techniques.
AI Modeling :
Proficiency in statistical and machine learning techniques for predictive modeling, classification, and regression.
Programming Languages : Very strong knowledge of Python and SQL.
Cloud Expertise : Strong experience with AWS cloud services and tools, including AWS SageMaker for model development, training, and deployment, and AWS Bedrock for building and fine-tuning foundation models.
AI & ML Platforms : Experience in working with model registry tools such as MLflow, SageMaker Model Registry, or other similar systems, to track, version, and manage machine learning models throughout their lifecycle.
DataOp & MLOps : Experience implementing DataOps, MLOps, and/or DevSecOps in the AI, ML, and software development lifecycle.
ML Languages : Experience building ML models with PyTorch, Scikit-learn, and GenAI models.
LLM Models : Experience working with LLM frameworks such as HuggingFace libraries and with agent-based frameworks such as LangChain and Mirascope.
Data Experience : Familiarity with Snowflake for cloud data warehousing, data integration, and efficient handling of large-scale data storage and processing.
Above and Beyond
Specialized Knowledge & Background : PhD degree in mathematics, statistics, economics, computer science, or other quantitative disciplines with a focus on data analysis.
FinTech/PropTech Expertise : Experience working in FinTech or PropTech sectors.
Startup Experience : Familiarity with the dynamics of startup environments.
Software Engineering Experience : Experience with microservices.
Compliance Knowledge : Experience working in SOC2-certified, ISO-certified, or similar organizations.
Competitive Benefits That Support You
We invest in our people with benefits designed to help you thrive both personally and professionally:
Competitive Salary
– for Series B startup
Remote first work environment
- Where we trust you to get your work done.

title: Java Software Engineer
description:
About Ascendion
Ascendion is a full-service digital engineering solutions company. We make and manage software platforms and products that power growth and deliver captivating experiences to consumers and employees. Our engineering, cloud, data, experience design, and talent solution capabilities accelerate transformation and impact for enterprise clients. Headquartered in New Jersey, our workforce of 6,000+ Ascenders delivers solutions from around the globe. Ascendion is built differently to engineer the next.
Ascendion | Engineering to elevate life
We have a culture built on opportunity, inclusion, and a spirit of partnership. Come, change the world with us:
Build the coolest tech for world’s leading brands
Solve complex problems – and learn new skills
Experience the power of transforming digital engineering for Fortune 500 clients
Master your craft with leading training programs and hands-on experience
Experience a community of change makers!
Join a culture of high-performing innovators with endless ideas and a passion for tech. Our culture is the fabric of our company, and it is what makes us unique and diverse. The way we share ideas, learning, experiences, successes, and joy allows everyone to be their best at Ascendion.
About the Role:
Role: Software Engineers Java
Location: LATAM
Employment Type: Contract
Job Summary:
Responsibilities :
Proficient in search and data processing systems using Elastic, Spring Framework, Kafka, event-driven processing and API’s.
Optimize and scale search and data processing infrastructure to handle growing data volumes and user requests
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
Follow best practices for data indexing, search optimization, and data integrity
Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues, and ensure high availability and reliability
Participate in code reviews and contribute to a high standard of code quality
Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure our systems remain cutting-edge
Qualifications :
Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field
5+ years of professional software engineering experience
Proven experience with Elasticsearch and other search technologies
Strong proficiency in Java and experience with Java batch processing
Hands-on experience with Kafka and distributed messaging systems
Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software design principles
Experience with cloud platforms and infrastructure (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure)
Experience with CI/CD pipelines, containerization (Docker, Kubernetes, PCF, AKS), and microservices architecture
Excellent attention to detail
Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
Tell us about your experiences, education, and ambitions. Bring your knowledge, unique viewpoint, and creativity to the table. Let’s talk!

title: KYC Specialist(remote)
description:
Responsibilities:
Conduct international verification case reviews, including individual and corporate verifications.
Review and confirm the results of Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and economic sanctions blacklist screenings.
Coordinate with other departments on KYC/CDD-related workflows and process daily applications.
Assist in optimizing the global customer KYC/CDD process.
Analyze KYC vendor review situations and seek better solutions.
Assist in monitoring the daily status of KYC/CDD and check the system's operation.
Conduct research on the KYC/CDD regulatory requirements and documentation for different countries and complete the research report.
Assist in the implementation of AML policies and other policies involving KYC/CDD.
Responsible for dealing with difficult KYC problems related to Portuguese, Spanish if applicable.
Support the Team Leader in completing other related tasks.
Position Requirements:
A bachelor's degree or higher in finance, law, economics, auditing, languages or related fields from a full-time university program (preference for graduates from internationally renowned universities). Proficiency in Mandarin is preferred.
At least two years of experience in KYC/CDD or other compliance-related roles within banks, securities, or other financial institutions is preferred.
Proficiency in English, with the ability to use English as a working language.
Portuguese or Spanish is the native language.
Familiarity with Anti-Money Laundering and international economic sanctions theories; CAMS certification is a plus.
A stable personality with a strong sense of compliance and responsibility, strong learning and stress tolerance abilities, good communication skills, meticulous work, high enthusiasm, and a sense of responsibility.
Basic data analysis skills and proficiency in using office software such as Excel, Word, PPT.

title: Técnico em Mecânica
description:
Descrição da Posição:
Estamos em busca de um
Técnico em Mecânica
para integrar nossa equipe! Se você tem experiência com
cadastro e classificação de materiais
em ambiente SAP, conhecimento em normas técnicas e especificação de materiais, essa pode ser a oportunidade ideal para você.
Principais Atividades:
Criação e alteração de classes de materiais, características, valores e dependências, hierarquia de classes, palavras-chaves, conceito, assim como a inserção e o ajuste de quaisquer outras informações necessárias às regras da estrutura de classificação, conforme a demanda de cadastro e de padronização de materiais, de grupos técnicos, além de revisões de classe e outras rotinas internas;
Monitoramento e controle de alterações e cadastros de NMs em classes prioritárias, tal como classes com status bloqueadas, padronizadas e afins;
Solicitação criação e atualização de Grupo de Mercadorias (GM).
Inclusão e alteração de relacionamento de classe e unidade de medida básica (UMB);
Identificação e eliminação de dados em duplicidades na estrutura de classes;
Inserção e disponibilização de mídias como fotos, documentos e especificações técnicas;
Correção de erros técnicos, ortográficos, caracteres, dependências e quaisquer outros referentes à estrutura de classificação e em conflito com regras do SAP;
Orientação quanto ao processo de classificação de materiais, de forma ampla e não exaustiva, como a verificação de necessidade de criação de classe, indicação de classe a ser utilizada, utilização de características e valores, bem como o suporte à toda a estrutura de classes e de relacionamentos de classificação no SAP;
Criação, inclusão e desvinculação de documentos de notas padrão;
Participação de reuniões ou encontros técnicos, de forma virtual, para execução das atividades de suporte técnico.
Análise e interpretação de normas técnicas nacionais e internacionais, a fim de apoiar esforços na manutenção do PDM e no correto cadastramento de materiais.
Criação, modificação, atualização, marcação e desmarcação de eliminação de material dos tipos existentes (não exaustivos, ZIBE, ZEIH e ZERP), de forma única no sistema SAP associado ao NCM correspondente, atendendo as regras e padrões da PETROBRAS.
Requisitos Indispensáveis:
Formação: Técnico em Mecânica.
Conhecimentos Indispensáveis:
Uso avançado em Office.
Uso de SAP BW e SAP S/4Hana- módulo MM.
Conhecimento de normas técnicas nacionais e internacionais.
Conhecimento intermediário da língua inglesa.
Requisitos Desejáveis:
Uso de
Business Intelligence
(BI) como Spotfire, Power BI etc.
Métodos ágeis e sua aplicação nas rotinas de trabalho (Kanbam, Scrum etc.).
Experiência comprovada em atividades de classificação de materiais e/ou engenharia de manutenção na indústria de Petróleo e Gás.

Seguro de vida.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Context
We are a fast-growing startup that has experienced tremendous growth over the past months, achieving 5x revenue growth in the last 12 months and a 10x usage increase over the same period. As we continue on this upward trajectory, we are expanding our team to support our rapidly scaling infrastructure and ensure we can meet the demands of our ever-growing user base.
Mission
As a Full-Stack Engineer, you will design, build, and optimize scalable applications. You will own features end-to-end and work closely with stakeholders to take ideas from concept to release, maintain & scale. This role demands a hands-on approach, strong motivation, and a drive to seek the best solutions while maintaining high-quality standards.
Key Responsibilities
Own Features from 0 to 1 : Take complete ownership of features, collaborating with stakeholders to define requirements, design solutions, and deliver them to production. Ensure every detail is addressed through to the finish line.
Scalable Infrastructure : Collaborate with infrastructure teams to design systems that handle increasing traffic and usage efficiently.
Build and Scale Applications : Develop and maintain scalable, high-quality features and applications.
Ensure Code Quality
by Promoting the adoption of Test-Driven Development (TDD) and maintaining high standards for reliability and maintainability.
Integrations Between Frontend and Backend : Design and build systems that simplify and enhance integrations between front-end and back-end applications, enabling seamless communication and efficient data exchange.
Support Collaboration : Partner with the support team to diagnose and resolve complex issues, improving tools and processes to enhance the customer experience.
Observability and Monitoring : Strengthen our observability by integrating and improving tools that provide insights into application health and performance.
Who We Are Looking For
We seek a Full Stack Engineer who thrives in high-growth environments and combines technical expertise with relentless motivation. You’ll take pride in building scalable systems, owning features end-to-end, and delivering user value.
Key Qualifications
Node.js, TypeScript & React Expertise : Extensive experience with NodeJS, TS, & React, leveraging modern development patterns and best practices.
Event-Driven Architecture : Proven experience building event-driven systems using tools like message brokers or similar technologies.
TDD Focus : Commitment to Test-Driven Development (TDD) and a strong track record of delivering high-quality code.
Scalable Applications : Experience designing and maintaining systems that perform under heavy traffic and scale with user demand.
Monitoring Tools : Proficiency with observability tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, ELK) for monitoring and maintaining system health.
Ownership Mindset : Demonstrated ability to take ownership of features, from initial design through production release.
Ultra-motivated and Hands-On : Eager to dive into the code and solve challenging problems with enthusiasm and focus.
Seek the Best Solutions : Continuously evaluate and implement the best tools, technologies, and methodologies to solve problems effectively and innovate within the team.
Thrives in Chaos:
Ability to embrace and adapt to the fast-paced, dynamic environment of a high-scaling startup, maintaining focus and effectiveness amidst ambiguity.
Bonus Qualifications
Media Processing : Experience with video and audio processing, streaming technologies, or related workloads.
AI Integration : Worked with artificial intelligence systems or tools, either integrating AI features into applications or ensuring smooth collaboration with AI-based solutions.
Start-Up Experience : Prior experience working at a fast-growing, large-scale startup is a strong plus.
Diverse Technical Knowledge : A valuable asset is familiarity with additional programming languages, design patterns, or architectural paradigms.
Submit your application ‍‍
Just send an E-Mail to

with more info about you, why you're interested in joining the Squad, and what role you're looking to play.
We will start having a look at your applications in Mid-December, so don’t worry if you don’t hear from us before.
!!️ Please keep in mind - we're looking to hire our early team champions that are in for the long run! We love people who put in the effort to stand out!
The more care and personality you put into the application, the higher that we'll come back to you very fast️

title: Program Manager - Customer Service
description:
We’re Hiring: Program Manager - Customer Service
Keeta is an independent brand of Meituan, the world's largest tech-driven retail company. Keeta is revolutionizing the food delivery space. As a dynamic and innovative global platform, Keeta leverages cutting-edge technology to provide fast, reliable, and seamless food delivery experiences. With the mission "We help people eat better, live better", Keeta launched in 2023 and has rapidly expanded across key regions, including Hong Kong, Saudi Arabia and now Brazil.
Are you a strategic thinker and a collaborative leader who thrives on driving seamless coordination and operational excellence? We are looking for a Program Manager to bridge the gap between our business teams and service functions, ensuring the successful execution of key initiatives.
What You’ll Do
Be the Key Liaison – Act as the primary connection between business teams and service teams, ensuring smooth communication and goal alignment.
Drive Resource Efficiency – Coordinate cross-functional teams, optimize processes, and allocate resources across quality assurance, training, delivery, and process management to maximize efficiency.
Lead Program Execution – Develop and manage program plans, budgets, and priorities while identifying risks and implementing proactive solutions.
Why Keeta?
Innovation-Driven: Keeta uses the advanced technology solutions to disrupt the traditional food delivery landscape, making every order smarter and faster.
Fast-Growing & Dynamic: Keeta is expanding quickly, offering endless opportunities for personal and professional growth.
Global Impact: Join a company that’s transforming the way people enjoy food, impacting communities around the world.
What We’re Looking For
Bachelor’s degree or higher in Project Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
3+ years of experience in project or program management, preferably with a strong understanding of service operations.
Exceptional leadership & collaboration skills – Ability to work across teams and drive initiatives forward.
Proficiency in project management tools and strong analytical thinking.
Fluency in
English & Portuguese
– Excellent communication skills in speaking, listening, reading, and writing.
Bonus Points If You Have
PMP, PgMP, or similar certifications.
Experience in process optimization and standardization within service functions.
Location:
São Paulo, Brazil
Apply now and be part of a team where learning never stops!

  • Solve / handle technical escalations from the customers;
  • Provide technical advice for local distributors, installers and end users;
  • Provide minor on-site inspection, commissioning, troubleshooting and replacement of defectives products, with appointments of customers in advance;
  • Keep track of in-out of replacements units;
  • Perform firmware upgrading and minor reworks in hardware locally when necessary;
  • Maintain frequent communication with management staff in Brazil;
  • Maintain a good communication with Level 2 engineers based in HQ office, in China;
  • Attend exhibitions and marketing events and introduce products and solutions;
  • Submit the related reports and documents to supervisor every week;
  • Be available during work hours, from Monday-Friday, between 8-12h and 13:30-18h.
    Required Skills
  • Intermediate English for speaking and writing;
  • Technical degree in electricity, Photovoltaics, Renewable Energy or other comparable course;
  • Advanced knowledge of PV Inverters (on-grid and storage);
  • At least 1 year of experience with PV inverters;
  • Experience with DG (Distributed Generation);
  • Basic knowledge in sizing electrical circuits, PV arrangement, protection circuits, and interpretation of electrical diagrams;
  • Knowledge about Brazilian regulation on PV;
  • MS Office.
    Optional Skills
    (If you have them, it’s a Plus!)
  • Spanish speaking;
  • Experience with PV Large Utility-Scale;
  • Experience with lead-acid and lithium batteries for PV storage systems;
  • Zendesk experience;
  • NeoCRM experience.
    Attributions
  • Excellent organization skills with the ability to quickly assess priorities;
  • Proactivity, sense of urgency, team work;
  • Independence (work without direct supervision);
  • Availability for business trips in Brazil.

description:
ob Summary:

SAP DRC
solutions in conjunction with
MM (Materials Management)
processes.

Participate in full project lifecycle activities including design, testing, training, cutover, and go-live support.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to DRC integration with MM, including document mapping, output management, and interface errors.
Work closely with cross-functional teams including SAP FI, SD, and technical teams (ABAP/PI/CPI).

SAP MM Consultant , with at least 1–2 years working with
SAP DRC
or
eDocument Framework .
Solid understanding of
MM processes : procurement, invoice verification, goods movement, vendor master data.
Hands-on experience with
SAP DRC configuration , including output determination, mapping, and eDocument cockpit.
Familiarity with
local compliance regulations
and tax reporting requirements in countries such as Spain, Hungary, Italy, Brazil, Mexico, etc.

SAP S/4HANA

title: Salesforce Administrator
description:
We are looking for a full-time, remote
Salesforce Administrator
with 5+ years of experience to join the team of our U.S. client. You will support the ongoing development, configuration, and management of the Salesforce platform across Sales, Marketing, and Customer Service functions. The ideal candidate will have deep technical expertise, a keen analytical mindset, and the ability to drive business outcomes through platform optimization and insightful data analysis.
Our client unleashes the power of culture, driving brand growth with consumer insights, analytics, tools, and best practices for over 250 major U.S. brands. Its solutions are fueled by its cultural intelligence platform, which allows its customers to more effectively and efficiently understand, reach, and engage consumers, activating them across race, ethnicity, generation, gender, and sexual identity.
Our client comprises creative, analytical, diverse, hardworking, and fun individuals with an insatiable curiosity for the new collage of behaviors and patterns driving consumers today. The possibilities of the moment and opportunity to help organizations unlock their cultural capacity inspire them to seek out predictive insights and brand impacts that are unique to their model.
Responsibilities
Partner with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver scalable solutions
Design and implement automated processes using Flow, Process Builder, and approval workflows
Develop and enforce efficient data entry, tracking, and reporting practices
Ensure data integrity through regular audits, cleansing, validation rules, and backups
Oversee data imports and exports as well as manage integrations with tools, such as Marketo, Salesloft, Sales Navigator, and ZoomInfo
Develop and maintain reports, dashboards, and KPIs to support strategic decision-making
Translate data into actionable business insights to optimize the sales lifecycle and marketing performance
Lead Salesforce-related projects, monitor milestones, and ensure timely, effective delivery
Provide support, training, and documentation to users across varying skill levels
Promote user adoption through intuitive configurations and responsive troubleshooting
Customize and maintain Salesforce, including custom objects, fields, workflows, page layouts, validation rules, and Flows
Manage user accounts, profiles, roles, and permission sets to ensure proper access and data security
Ensure platform performance through upgrades, patches, and best practices implementation
Required Experience
Excellent English communication and interpersonal skills
5+ years of experience as a Salesforce Administrator in enterprise, B2B environments
Proficiency in Salesforce Sales Cloud setup and configuration
Strong understanding of CRM principles and Salesforce best practices
Advanced experience in Salesforce Flow development, reporting, and dashboard creation
Experience with integration tools and third-party platforms
Ability to design and test new features and customizations independently
Certification in at least one of the following: Salesforce Advanced Administrator, Platform App Builder, Sales Cloud Consultant, or Service Cloud Consultant
Exceptional problem-solving, analytical, and organizational skills
Ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment
Commitment to continuous learning as well as staying current with platform updates
Trustworthy, team-oriented, and transparent
Preferred Experience
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business, or related field, or equivalent experience
Additional Information
Knowing your ideas are heard and matter, think big!
You get to own your job and be recognized for your contributions
Work with smart and creative people
Making mistakes is human. Let's learn from them. Be transparent!
We recognize you as an individual no presumptions or judgment. Be the extraordinary you!
15 days Paid Time Off (PTO), 1 floating day, 3 sick days, and designated national holidays
Start: ASAP
About Velozient
We are a privately held, nearshore software development company providing outsourced development resources to North American companies. Our mission is to offer development talent who enjoy taking on challenging work, want to grow their skills and experiences building software, and excel in a fast-paced, dynamic team environment. We are focused on providing world-class remote resources to work as valued client team members. If this type of opportunity excites you, then consider joining our team!

title: Coordenador fiscal
description:
